name: Aestra Merino Polo
description: Soft Merino jumper with decorative hems. The work is knitted from the top down with a saddle shoulders.
full_text: Soft Merino jumper with decorative hems. The work is knitted from the top down with a saddle shoulders. WORK OVERVIEW: · The work is knitted from the top down with a saddle shoulder. · The neckline and the yoke are worked in the round on a circular needle. · Stitches are increased for the saddle shoulder, then for the sleeves, and finally for the yoke. · The yoke is divided into front and back piece and sleeves. · The front and back piece are worked in the round on the circular needle from the top down. · The sleeves are worked in the round on double pointed needles or a short circular needle from the top down. SIZES AVAILABLE: (XS-XXXL) XS-S-M-L-XL-XXL-XXXL MEASUREMENTS: Total length: 51-53-54-55-58½-59½-61½cm Sleeve length: 41-42-43-44-45-46-47cm Chest width: 42-45-48-51-58-64-68cm NEEDLES: Circular needles nr. 2.5: 40cm(or Double pointed needles) Circular needles nr. 3.5: 40cm/60cm/80cm YARN: SANDNES GARN Double Sunday - 6050 Above The Clouds (500-500-550-600-650-750-800g)
